description: The political smear artists at Politico and Mother Jones apparently ran out of vaguely unflattering photos of Rand Paul.
title: Politico, Mother Jones Tweet Same Photo For Contradictory Rand Paul Smears
title_page: Politico, Mother Jones Tweet Same Photo For Contradictory Rand Paul Smears
text:
The political smear artists at Politico and Mother Jones apparently ran out of vaguely unflattering photos of Republican Presidential candidate Sen. Rand Paul (R-KY), as they both tweeted out the exact same image for two contradictory narratives about the Paul campaign.
Politico’s piece, largely based on anonymous sourcing, says that Rand Paul is disengaged and does not seem to want to win the race.
Mother Jones says that Rand Paul is unprincipled (unlike his father Ron Paul, who MoJo also hates) and will do anything to win.
Neither piece is particularly worth reading but they do show that 1) liberal writers really despise Sen. Rand Paul in particular and 2) Republicans in general and 3) the organization’s have small photo budgets.
Rand Paul’s photo was unavailable for comment.
